parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Defective Front Axle (Driveshaft) Causing Vibration and Shuddering
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The faulty front axle can cause severe vibration and shuddering, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Severe vibration or shuddering of the vehicle
and around 60 mph; abnormal sounds; harsh vibration felt through the passenger side front of the car.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Transmission Failure Causing Shuddering and Vibrations
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The defective transmission can cause the vehicle to shudder and vibrate violently, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Faulty VTC Actuator Causing Engine Wear and Potential Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The faulty VTC actuator can cause excessive engine wear, leading to catastrophic engine failure, which can occur at any time, posing a significant hazard to drivers and passengers.
symptoms: but potential engine failure can lead to accidents

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: High-Speed Vibration and Steering Wheel Shaking
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The vibration and shaking of the steering wheel can cause loss of control, reduced vehicle stability, and increased risk of accidents, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: The steering wheel vibrates or shakes while driving
the vibration stops when letting off the gas pedal
the axle vibrates under acceleration load at high speed
the vehicle accelerates erratically within the same speed range.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the front airbag to deploy in a crash can increase the risk of serious injury or death to the driver and passengers.
symptoms: The front airbag does not deploy in a crash
despite the severity of the impact meeting the deployment threshold.
